column5: Blueprints of the renovations completed in the early 1970s done by architect John A. Grove Jr.
Cup with the name St. Andrew's church on the side. This was part of a large collection of church dishware that was used during functions that had meals.
A framed print of the crest of the Episocopal Diocese of Pittsburgh.
Photo of Leroy Hall, a priest who served the Episcopal diocese, including St. Andrew's Church. Writing gives dates as June 15, 1947 - April 5, 1953.

column3: New Kensington natives return to hometown, make former church their home
column5: Article on renovations completed by the new owners.
